description: A React component for an autocomplete connector selector that appears near the caret in a textarea. It handles debounced searches, keyboard navigation, and selection of connector items with visual positioning relative to the caret.

methods.name: useDebounced
methods.description: A custom hook that debounces a value with a specified delay.

methods.name: computeCaretRect
methods.description: Calculates the position of the caret in a textarea to position suggestion overlay.

methods.name: ConnectorSelector
methods.description: Main React component that renders the overlay with connector suggestions, manages search, navigation, and selection logic.
